attributes.action: Stop the plans to add fluoride to our water supplies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Much research has linked fluoride to brain disorders, bone cancer, thyroid disruption and further medical problems. Whilst some studies have linked a reduction in tooth decay with the addition of fluoride to water, other studies have shown that rates of tooth decay have reduced at a similar rate in countries where fluoride is not added to the water system.
A more acceptable and ethical alternative would be to subsidise dental products for low-income families.
Therefore we propose that the PM rejects  the plans to compulsorily medicate the UK with this known endocrine disruptor.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
